alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 23 at 3:39PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...BLIZZARD CONDITIONS WILL MAKE TRAVEL NEARLY IMPOSSIBLE FOR PORTIONS OF JEFFERSON COUNTY... HAZARDS...The combination of a band of heavy snow and winds gusting to 50 mph will produce blizzard conditions. In this band visibility below a quarter mile. Do not attempt to travel in this band. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 334 PM EST, the band extended from Sackets Harbor, across Watertown to Philadelphia. The band will remain nearly stationary through sunset. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Watertown, Fort Drum, Stony Point, Clayton, Dexter, Glen Park, Redwood, Adams Center, Henderson Harbor, Southwick Beach State Park, Sackets Harbor, Henderson, Black River, Smithville, Philadelphia, Brownville, Theresa, Cape Vincent, Antwerp and Chaumont. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 42 and 49. SAFETY INFO... Travel will be nearly impossible in this area, with blizzard conditions. The snow will accumulate so rapidly that it will be extremely difficult for the road crews to keep the roads clear. &&
